creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: vivid, colorful, rocky mountain at center among other, lower, but jagged mountains; daimyo procession, indicated by a line of yellow hats, a pole with a white tassel, and two mounted figures, makes its way through a valley at R; seascape at L with evidence of buildings near center; Mt. Fuji in white at L
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar UL edge; ULQ, near center
title: Hakone, from "53 Stations of the Tokaido Road"
